title: Divya Nakshatra Haaram: Emerald & Ruby Diamond Necklace
features: This exquisitely crafted Haaram features intricate filigree work adorned with shimmering diamonds. The central design showcases a captivating Pear-Cut Emerald, complemented by a matching Ruby pendant below. Delicate cultured pearls cascade from the floral motifs, adding a touch of traditional elegance. The design incorporates traditional Telugu 'Addigai' elements with a modern flair. 'Vanki' inspired patterns can be observed within the design.
occasions: and other celebratory occasions. Makes a stunning statement piece for high-end parties and events.
description: This Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian artistry with contemporary design sensibilities. The high-quality diamonds provide unparalleled brilliance, while the Emerald and Ruby centerpiece adds a pop of regal color. Its timeless design ensures it will be a cherished heirloom for generations to come. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a lasting shine and durability.
